subdomains.name: Foundations of Analysis
subdomains.description: Real numbers, limits, and continuity — the bedrock upon which all of analysis is built.
subdomains.flavor: The Bedrock — where infinity first reveals its paradoxes.

topics.name: Real Number System
topics.description: The complete ordered field. Completeness axiom, supremum, infimum, density of rationals and irrationals.
topics.flavor: The number line — deceptively simple, infinitely deep.

topics.name: Limits
topics.description: The epsilon-delta definition. Limit laws, squeeze theorem, limits at infinity.
topics.flavor: Getting infinitely close without ever arriving — the heartbeat of analysis.

topics.name: Continuity
topics.description: Functions without breaks. Intermediate value theorem, extreme value theorem, uniform continuity.
topics.flavor: An unbroken thread through space — no jumps, no gaps.

subdomains.name: Calculus
subdomains.description: Differentiation and integration — the twin pillars of mathematical analysis.
subdomains.flavor: The Twin Stars — differentiation and integration, forever linked by the Fundamental Theorem.

topics.name: Derivatives
topics.description: Rate of change. Power rule, chain rule, product rule, quotient rule. Tangent lines and instantaneous velocity.
topics.flavor: The slope of the universe at a single point in time.

topics.name: Applications of Derivatives
topics.description: Optimization, related rates, L'Hôpital's rule, curve sketching, mean value theorem.
topics.flavor: Finding the peaks and valleys — where do things reach their extremes?

topics.name: Integrals
topics.description: Antiderivatives and definite integrals. Riemann sums, fundamental theorem of calculus, substitution.
topics.flavor: Adding up infinitely many infinitely small pieces — and getting a finite answer.

topics.name: Integration Techniques
topics.description: Integration by parts, partial fractions, trigonometric substitution, improper integrals.
topics.flavor: An art as much as a science — each integral is a puzzle.

subdomains.name: Sequences & Series
subdomains.description: Infinite sequences and their sums. Convergence tests, power series, Taylor series.
subdomains.flavor: The Infinite Staircase — each step smaller than the last, but does it reach the top?

topics.name: Sequences
topics.description: Ordered lists of numbers approaching a limit. Monotone convergence, Cauchy sequences, Bolzano-Weierstrass.
topics.flavor: A journey through numbers — where does it end?

topics.name: Infinite Series
topics.description: Summing infinitely many terms. Geometric series, comparison test, ratio test, root test.

topics.name: Power Series & Taylor Series
topics.description: Representing functions as infinite polynomials. Radius of convergence, Taylor's theorem, Maclaurin series.
topics.flavor: Every smooth function has an infinite polynomial twin — you just have to find it.

subdomains.name: Multivariable Calculus
subdomains.description: Calculus in multiple dimensions. Partial derivatives, multiple integrals, vector calculus.
subdomains.flavor: The Dimension Gate — calculus breaks free from the line into planes, volumes, and beyond.

topics.name: Partial Derivatives
topics.description: Derivatives of functions of several variables. Gradient, directional derivatives, the Jacobian.
topics.flavor: Change in many directions at once — which way is steepest?

topics.name: Multiple Integrals
topics.description: Double and triple integrals. Change of variables, polar/cylindrical/spherical coordinates.
topics.flavor: Summing over surfaces and volumes — measuring higher-dimensional worlds.

topics.name: Vector Calculus
topics.description: Line integrals, surface integrals, divergence, curl. Green's, Stokes', and the divergence theorem.
topics.flavor: The great unifying theorems — connecting boundaries to interiors across dimensions.
